description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for GL-015 INSULSCAN - Insulation Scanning and Thermal Assessment Agent. Monitors heat loss, condition scores, hot spots, safety metrics, and ROI.

panels.description: Total number of assets currently being monitored by INSULSCAN
panels.title: Total Assets Monitored

panels.description: Number of active hot spots detected across all monitored assets
panels.title: Active Hot Spots

panels.description: Average condition score across all monitored assets (0-100 scale)
panels.title: Average Condition Score

panels.description: Total heat loss across all monitored assets in kilowatts
panels.title: Total Heat Loss (kW)

panels.description: Heat loss trend over time for each monitored asset
panels.title: Heat Loss by Asset

panels.description: Distribution of heat loss values across all assets
panels.title: Heat Loss Distribution

panels.description: Insulation efficiency percentage per asset (higher is better)
panels.title: Insulation Efficiency %

panels.description: Projected annual energy cost savings from improved insulation
panels.title: Energy Cost Savings

panels.description: Condition score trend over time for each asset
panels.title: Condition Score Trend

panels.description: Distribution of assets by condition category
panels.title: Condition Score Distribution

panels.description: Rate of insulation degradation per day for each asset
panels.title: Degradation Rate

panels.description: Assets with condition scores below threshold requiring immediate attention
panels.title: Assets Requiring Attention

panels.description: Number of hot spots detected over time by severity
panels.title: Hot Spot Count

panels.description: Maximum surface temperature readings with burn risk threshold
panels.title: Surface Temperature Max

panels.description: Total number of thermal anomalies detected
panels.title: Thermal Anomalies Detected

panels.description: Hot spot locations by asset and zone
panels.title: Hot Spot Locations

panels.description: Number of burn risk alerts triggered (surfaces >60C)
panels.title: Burn Risk Alerts

panels.description: Velocity limiter interventions to prevent rapid changes
panels.title: Velocity Limiter Interventions

panels.description: Current state of circuit breakers (0=closed, 1=open, 0.5=half-open)
panels.title: Circuit Breaker States

panels.description: Emergency shutdown events with details
panels.title: Emergency Shutdown Events

panels.description: Payback period in months for recommended repair projects
panels.title: Payback Period by Project

panels.description: Net Present Value of recommended repair projects
panels.title: NPV of Repairs

panels.description: Cumulative repair cost savings over time
panels.title: Repair Cost Savings

panels.description: Recommended repair/replacement projects with ROI metrics
panels.title: Projects Recommended

panels.description: Request latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99)
panels.title: Request Latency p50/p95/p99

panels.description: Error rate as percentage of total requests
panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: Requests per second throughput
panels.title: Throughput RPS

panels.description: Memory usage percentage
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage percentage
panels.title: CPU Usage

title: GL-015 INSULSCAN - Insulation Monitoring
